ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srgidcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_srgmgp | |- ( R e. SRing -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 2 | #P_ringidval | |- .1. = ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mndidcl | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd -> .1. e. B ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. SRing -> .1. e. B ) |
